labels.name: story
labels.value: Check if Admin able to update a program with valid programName endpoint and valid request body

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: Check if Admin able to update a program with valid programName endpoint and valid request body

name: Check if Admin able to update a program with valid programName endpoint and valid request body

steps.name: Given  Admin provides valid authentication details
Given  Admin creates PUT by programName Request for the LMS Program API endpoint to "UpdateProgramWithAllValidFieldsPresentInRequestBody"
When  Admin sends HTTPS PUT Request with valid programName endpoint to update program
Then  Admin receives 200 OK Status with updated value in program response body
